Name: Bester
Description: "Genius" Mechanic: On [TECHING] Tests, "Thrillin' Heroics" bonus dice do not apply.

Name: Billy
Description: Salvage Pro: +1 Cargo from Salvage Ops.

Name: Bree
Description: Black Market Ties: May sell Parts to any Solid Contact for $300.

Name: Bridgit
Description: Deceptive: If Yolonda or Saffron are hired by anyone, Remove Bridgit from Play.

Name: Crow
Description: Knife Fighter: +[FIGHT] When Carrying a Knife. May not Carry a Firearm.

Name: Doralee
Description: Angry Mob: +[FIGHT] When you have at least 3 Hill Folk in your crew.

Name: Emma
Description: Morale Booster: You may use an Action on your turn to remove Disgruntled from a Crew other than Emma.

Name: Fendris
Description: Henchman #2: If your Leader becomes Disgruntled, Disgruntle Fendris instead.

Name: Grange Brothers
Description: Two of a Kind: May Carry 2 Gear. Must pass 2 Alliance Wanted Crew rolls to dodge capture.

Name: Helen
Description: Morale Booster: You may use an Action on your turn to remove Disgruntled from a Crew other than Helen.

Name: Inara
Description: Ambassador: May re-roll NEGOTIATING] Tests.

Name: Interrogator
Description: Medic Check: Roll when a Crew is Killed: 1-4: Crew is still Killed. 5-6: Return Crew to Ship.

Name: Jayne
Description: Public Relations: May Carry 3 Gear.

Name: Jesse
Description: Opportunist: +1 Contraband from Salvage Ops.

Name: Kaylee
Description: Natural Know How: May re-roll [TECHING] Tests.

Name: Lucy
Description: Morale Booster: You may use an Action on your turn to remove Disgruntled from a Crew other than Lucy.

Name: Lund
Description: Cheap Shot: May use Gear in "Kosherized" [FIGHTING] Tests.

Name: River Tam
Description: Gifted: Before each Test, roll: 1-2: Return to Ship 3: [FIGHT][FIGHT] 4: [TECH][TECH] 5: [NEGOTIATE][NEGOTIATE] 6: 3 of any chosen Skill.

Name: Saffron
Description: Deceptive: If Bridgit or Yolonda are hired by anyone, Remove Saffron from Play.

Name: Shepherd Book
Description: Secret Past: If Working Immoral Job, Shepherd Book must stay Onboard Ship.

Name: Simon Tam
Description: "I am very smart": +2 to Medic Checks. +2 to River Tam's "Gifted" rolls.

Name: Skunk
Description: Firebug: +[NEGOTIATE] When Carrying Explosives.

Name: Stark
Description: Angry Mob: +[FIGHT] When you have at least 3 Hill Folk in your crew.

Name: Stitch
Description: Cantankerous: Once per job, may treat a [NEGOTIATING] as a [FIGHTING] Test.

Name: The Patron
Description: Angry Mob: +[FIGHT] When you have at least 3 Hill Folk in your crew.

Name: Tracey
Description: Unlucky: Whenever a Crew is Killed, Tracey must be Killed first.

Name: Two-Fry
Description: Dead-Eye: When Carrying a Sniper Rifle on Jobs, draw 1 fewer Misbehave Card, down to a minimum of 1.

Name: Wash
Description: Hard Burn: +1 to Full Burn Range.

Name: Yolonda
Description: Deceptive: If Saffron or Bridgit are hired by anyone, Remove Yolanda from Play.

Name: Zoe
Description: Dust Devil: May re-roll [FIGHTING] Tests.

Name: Burgess
Description: Taker: When you complete a Shipping Job, Load 1 Cargo.

Name: Corbin
Description: Chop Shop: You may Buy Drive Cores and Ship Upgrades at half price.

Name: Malcolm
Description: Brown Coat: When you complete a Crime Job, take $500.

Name: Marco
Description: Gun Runner: You may Buy Gear with the "Explosives" or "Firearm" Keywords at half price.

Name: Monty
Description: Smuggler Extraordinaire: When you complete a Smuggling Job, take $500.

Name: Nandi
Description: Heart of Gold: May Hire Crew at no cost.

Name: Womack
Description: Cold and Heartless: When you complete an Immoral Job take $500.

Name: Accountant
Description: Cooking the Books: Whenever you receive a Goal token, take $500.

Name: Elder Gommen
Description: Devout: If Working Immoral Job, Elder Gommen must stay Onboard Ship.

Name: Head Goon
Description: Goon Squad: +[NEGOTIATE][NEGOTIATE] When you have at least 3 Mercs in Crew.

Name: The Fixer
Description: Shady Connections

Name: The Specialist
Description: Wet Work: May not Carry Gear.

Name: Agent McGinnis
Description: Fed: Whenever you lose a [SHOWDOWN], Warrant Issued to Rival. Bounty Bonus +$500. Will not Work Illegal Jobs.

Name: Chari
Description: Turncoat: In a [SHOWDOWN], you may force a Rival to re-roll.

Name: Dalin
Description: Intel Broker: Once per Work Action, you may pay $200 to discard and re-draw a Misbehave Card.

Name: Deputy
Description: Posse: +[FIGHT] in [SHOWDOWN]. Bounty Bonus: +$300. Will not work Illegal Jobs.

Name: Dobson
Description: Mole: In Alliance Space, you may move Alliance Cruiser to your Sector as a Fly Action. Bounty Bonus +$500. Will not work Illegal Jobs.

Name: Fed Marshal
Description: Posse: +[FIGHT] in [SHOWDOWN]. Bounty Bonus: +$300. Will not work Illegal Jobs.

Name: Meadows
Description: Hero Worship: Any time a Crew is Killed, Apprehended, or Seized by the Alliance, you may Kill Meadows instead.

Name: Sheriff Bourne
Description: Jurisdiction: +[FIGHT][FIGHT] while in Border Space. Bounty Bonus: +$500. Will not work Illegal Jobs.

Name: The Guardian
Description: Security Pro: May re-roll [SHOWDOWN] Tests.

Name: "Sash"
Description: Pirate: When you complete a Piracy Job, steal $500 from the targeted Rival.

Name: Jubal Early
Description: Bounty Hunter: +[FIGHT][FIGHT] When Attacking in [SHOWDOWN]. May Carry 2 Gear.

Name: Blondie
Description: Deceptive: If Deceptive Crew are hired by anyone, Remove Blondie from Play.

Name: Bridgit (replacement)
Description: Deceptive: If Deceptive Crew are hired by anyone, Remove Bridgit from Play.

Name: Canine Culinarian
Description: Live Like Real People: When you pass the Dinosaur, you may remove Disgruntled from a Crew.

Name: Elizabeth
Description: Deceptive: If Deceptive Crew are hired by anyone, Remove Elizabeth from Play.

Name: Good Dogs Cook
Description: Live Like Real People: When you pass the Dinosaur, you may remove Disgruntled from a Crew.

Name: Haulers
Description: Many Hands, Light Work: During Salvage Ops, re-roll an Test result of 1.

Description: Many Hands, Light Work: During Salvage Ops, re-roll an Test result of 1.

Name: Princess
Description: Deceptive: If Deceptive Crew are hired by anyone, Remove Princess from Play.

Name: Red
Description: On the Double: When you load Goods for a Job, you may Evade.

Name: Saffron (replacement)
Description: Deceptive: If Deceptive Crew are hired by anyone, Remove Saffron from Play.

Name: Yolonda (replacement)
Description: Deceptive: If Deceptive Crew are hired by anyone, Remove Yolonda from Play.

Name: Banning
Description: +[NEGOTIATE][NEGOTIATE] when attacking in SHOWDOWN.

Name: Belinda
Description: Broker: Whenever you sell Cargo to a Contact, you may sell it as either Cargo or Contraband.

Name: Cabott
Description: Standards: +[NEGOTIATE] when you have no Mudders or Hill Folk in your Crew.

Name: Gabriel Tam
Description: Alliance Connections: When you complete a Legal Job, take $300. Will not work Illegal Jobs.

Name: Regan Tam
Description: Alliance Connections: When you complete a Legal Job, take $300. Will not work Illegal Jobs.

Name: Bolles
Description: The Pair You Have: If you Proceed past two Misbehave Cards of the same suit in a row while Working a Job, take $500.

Name: Cap'n Jayne
Description: The Hero of Canton: Mudders in your Crew do not become Disgruntled if they are not paid their Cut of successful Jobs. May Carry 2 Gear.

Name: Haymer
Description: Collector: When you complete a Caper, take $500. You may ignore the effects of "Tweaked One" besides reshuffling the Capers Deck.

Name: Petaline
Description: Mama Bear: Grifters in your Crew do not become Disgruntled if they are not paid their Cut of successful Jobs. +[FIGHT][FIGHT] when Defending in SHOWDOWN.

Name: The Councilor
Description: Pull Some Strings: At the start of your turn, you may take 1 Gear from any discard pile. Return it at the end of your turn.

Name: Jayne
Description: Public Relations: May Carry 3 Gear. * Big Damn Heroes: When you Proceed while Misbehaving, take $100.

Name: Kaylee
Description: Natural Know How: May re-roll [TECHING] Tests. * Big Damn Heroes: When you Proceed while Misbehaving, take $100.

Name: Wash
Description: Hard Burn: +1 to Full Burn Range. * Big Damn Heroes: When you Proceed while Misbehaving, take $100.

Name: Zoe
Description: Dust Devil: May re-roll [FIGHTING] Tests. * Big Damn Heroes: When you Proceed while Misbehaving, take $100.

Name: Malcolm
Description: Brown Coat: When you complete a Crime Job, take $500. * Big Damn Heroes: When you Proceed while Misbehaving, take $100.

Name: Cortland
Description: Laws Are For the Poor: May pay Bribes before any [NEGOTIATING] Test. Bribes may not be used in [SHOWDOWNS].

Name: Head Goon
Description: Goon Squad: +[NEGOTIATE][NEGOTIATE] When you have at least 3 Mercs in Crew.

Name: Sheydra
Description: Composure: Once per job, may treat a [FIGHTING] as a [NEGOTIATING] Test.

Name: The Middleman
Description: Facilitator: Whenever you sell Contraband to a Contact, take an extra $100 per Contraband sold.

Name: The Salesman
Description: Wholesaler: As a Buy Action, discard to purchase a Ship Upgrade or Drive Core from any discard pile, at half price. This may be done from any location.

Name: Atherton
Description: Black Mark: May not hire Crew with the Companion Profession.

Name: Murphy
Description: Trade Baron: Whenever you sell Cargo or Contraband to a Contact, take an extra $100 each.

Name: Barkeep
Description: Good Times: Giving your Crew Shore Leave at Supply Planets is free.

Description: Good Times: Giving your Crew Shore Leave at Supply Planets is free.

Description: Mesmerize: Discard to ignore a Warrant Issued.

Name: Fess
Description: Phone Home: From any location, you may use a Deal Action to Deal with Higgins. Accept or discard the Jobs normally.

Name: Foreman
Description: Mudder Manager:+[FIGHT][FIGHT] When you have at least 3 Mudders in your Crew.

Name: Grimey
Description: Errand Boy: When you discard a Gear Card, roll a dice. If you roll a 6, keep the Gear Card. Otherwise, discard it normally.

Name: Holder
Description: Shanghai: When you Make-Work, you may also take a Fugitive Token.

Name: Roberta
Description: Make Nice: You May Discard Roberta instead of losing Solid Rep with a Contact.

Name: Wright
Description: Dirty Slaver: Whenever you deliver Fugitives, you may take an extra $100 per Fugitive. Ths counts as Immoral.

Name: Zoe
Description: Loyalty: Soldiers in your Crew do not become Disgruntled if they are not paid their Cut of successful Jobs. May Carry 2 Gear.
